snippet.title: Red Dead Redemption and Undead Nightmare Coming to Switch and PS4
snippet.description:
On August 17, the beloved Western experience Red Dead Redemption and its horror companion Undead Nightmare arrive together for the first time on the Nintendo Switch and modern PlayStation systems. 

Add Red Dead Redemption to your wish list now on the Nintendo eShop and PlayStation Store to receive a notification when it becomes available: http://rsg.ms/e18cdd8
